p: Differences in the survival of bay scallop larvae between treatments were assessed with a one‐way analysis of variance (ANOVA) using R ® ( www.r-project.org, version 3.2.5) statistical software. When significant differences were detected, pairwise comparisons between treatments were performed using Tukey's honest significant difference test (Tukey HSD). All data were confirmed to display a normal distribution with equal variance using Shapiro–Wilk's and Bartlett's tests, respectively. All results were deemed significant at α ≤ 0.05.
